mapper.sql: id, cid, rphone, cname, rnumber, price, checkindate, checkoutdate, checkin, useable, ordernumber
mapper.select: SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,record.checkindate,record.checkoutdate) AS StampdiffTime FROM record WHERE record.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from record where checkindate = CURDATE()
mapper.insert: insert into record (cid, rphone, cname, rnumber, price, checkindate, checkoutdate, checkin, useable, ordernumber) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{checkindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkoutdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checkin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into record
cid,
rphone,
cname,
rnumber,
price,
checkindate,
checkoutdate,
checkin,
useable,
ordernumber,

mapper.update:
update record
cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rphone = #{rphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rnumber = #{rnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
checkindate = #{checkindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
checkoutdate = #{checkoutdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
checkin = #{checkin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
useable = #{useable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ordernumber = #{ordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update record set cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rphone = #{rphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rnumber = #{rnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, checkindate = #{checkindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, checkoutdate = #{checkoutdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, checkin = #{checkin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, useable = #{useable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ordernumber = #{ordernumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
